body:
Just a quick question. Any of you getting this:

Connection lost, Timed out (Or something like that)?

If so how did you fix it (if you did)? Just a quick question .-.
body_tagged:
Just a quick question. Any of you getting this:

Connection lost, Timed out (Or something like that)?

If so how did you fix it (if you did)? Just a quick question .-.
title: Lag Issues...

replies.body:
i get it too,

replies.body: I'm not sure, I am also timing out a lot and changing IPs didn't fix it for me. I assume it is the server as it is happening to multiple people.
replies.body_tagged: I'm not sure, I am also timing out a lot and changing IPs didn't fix it for me. I assume it is the server as it is happening to multiple people.

replies.body: This is happening pretty often now
replies.body_tagged: This is happening pretty often now

replies.body: This is not an Avicus only issue (someone on ocn reported it)  so I don't think it has anything to do with the servers. We can just hope for it to be resolved ASAP
replies.body_tagged: This is not an Avicus only issue (someone on ocn reported it)  so I don't think it has anything to do with the servers. We can just hope for it to be resolved ASAP

replies.body: I remember it kept happening a few days ago to the point where I couldn't even finish a match without timing out... Hate that it is back -_-
replies.body_tagged: I remember it kept happening a few days ago to the point where I couldn't even finish a match without timing out... Hate that it is back -_-

replies.body: now I can't pvp D: it keeps lagging out, every 5 seconds, forcing me to look up, and hit randomly D:
replies.body_tagged: now I can't pvp D: it keeps lagging out, every 5 seconds, forcing me to look up, and hit randomly D:

replies.body:
Yeah! I lost, connection, every time!!! My connection sucks but I went to a friends house, and, I lost connection, too!!
PD: Please, do not, bully, this comment.

replies.body:
yeah this has been happening to me quite a bit as well... I'm just happy I'm not the only one, because i was beginning to rage :(
BUT guys its probably one of those matter of time issues where in a few more days it should clear up and it will all be back to normal, so imma stay patient :D
